description: KeeAutoExec This plugin allows to automatically open additional databases when opening a database.

installer.script: Get-Process -Name KeePass -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force -Verbose; Copy-Item "$dir\KeePassSubsetExport.plgx" "$(appdir keepass $global)\current\Plugins\KeePassSubsetExport.plgx"; KeePass

uninstaller.script: Get-Process -Name KeePass -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force -Verbose; Remove-Item "$(appdir keepass $global)\current\Plugins\KeePassSubsetExport.plgx" -Force; KeePass
